    public abstract class AbstractOptionActivity
extends com.brightcove.player.view.BrightcovePlayer
    Abstract Activity which extends the BrightcovePlayer activity and sets up the Option Menu
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Maximilian Nyman (max.nyman@anvilcreative.com)
